member.summary: Inserts a source into the TIA Portal project from an external file, creating a new external source.
member.param: The external source system group in which to insert the source.
The name to assign to the source.
The path to the external source file.
Outputs the created object.
Outputs any error message encountered during import.
member.returns: True if the source was imported successfully, otherwise false.

member.name: T:OpennessV16.HMATIAOpennessCurrentInstance
